summary: "Somebody That I Used to Know" is a popular song by Gotye featuring Kimbra. Released in 2011, it samples Luiz Bonf√°'s "Seville" and has a catchy xylophone melody. The song is about past relationships and was recorded in Gotye's parents' house. It won two Grammy Awards and was a huge global success, topping charts in many countries. The music video, directed by Natasha Pincus, has over 2 billion YouTube views and features Gotye and Kimbra covered in paint. The song has been performed on shows like The Voice and American Idol.
title: Somebody That I Used to Know
